snippet.title: Mariachi Legends - Official Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description:
Dive into the gorgeous and dangerous world of Mariachi Legends and see gameplay and more from this upcoming action-platforming game. Don the La Sombra and descend into Santa Mascota as Detective Pablo Cruz, chosen by Death herself. Blending Mexican folklore and classic arcade gameplay, Mariachi Legends is an action-platforming trip through a world where the Dead live once again. Mariachi Legends will be available on Steam and Nintendo Switch.

#IGN #Gaming
